title: Type Specimen Group
content:
There's a new group at Flickr dedicated to the collection of type specimens:  
 [http://www.flickr.com/groups/type\_specimen/](http://web.archive.org/web/20131014001344/http:/www.flickr.com/groups/type_specimen/ "http://www.flickr.com/groups/type\_specimen/")

Since Flickr is free and has already a huge community I think it's a great place to start a collection of type specimens.

Ralf
author: ralf h.

comments.content:
Thanx :)  
Its a nice group! Hope that many people will join this group to collect more specimen!
